slogan: We save your rights and protect your business
aboutContent: Imran Gulf Industries F. Co. is a leading provider of tailor-made solutions and premium quality products, founded in Saudi Arabia with a decade-long track record of excellence. We understand the importance of providing our customers with the very best in terms of quality, comfort, and style. Our specialization in supplying hotel linens to the hospitality industry and luxury bed linens to discerning households reflects our commitment to meeting the highest standards of elegance, luxury, and beauty. Whether you are a hotelier looking to elevate your guests' experience, or a household with an eye for luxury and comfort, we have the perfect solutions for you.
productsContent: Embark on an opulent journey through a realm of luxury, where curated elegance elevates every moment. Discover refined allure and cozy indulgence that transform spaces into sanctuaries of lavish comfort. Experience the symphony of supreme softness, as our brands redefine hospitality with unparalleled grandeur.
productNote: Note : Custom made color & sizes available on request
serviceSolagan: 20 Years In Hospitality Field, Dedicated To The Best Hotel Linen Supplier In Saudi Arabia
serviceSolagan0: Find the Products You’re Looking for in our catalog
service01: Your Factory-Direct Source for Wholesale Textiles and Hotel Beddings in Bulk
serviceContent01: Imran Gulf Industries F. Co. is a hotel bedding supplier in Saudi Arabia for bed, bath and hotel hospitality needs. Supplying commercial quality products to the hospitality and healthcare industries with fast shipping to commercial business. Every order and customer request, large or small, is handled with timely offer and suggestion.
service02: Hospitality Quality Bedding, Linens & Towels for Commercial Business
serviceContent02: Our products are ideal for Hotels, Lodges, Resort and Day Spas, Furniture Rental Companies, Healthcare Hospitality Homes, Nursing Homes, Camps, Colleges, Universities, Property Management Companies, and many other businesses that need commercial hospitality quality linens, beddings, towels, table linens, and accessories in bulk quantities at low wholesale prices. Whether you are a seasoned buyer searching for a new source or a hotel housekeeping manager looking for purchasing wholesale textiles for commercial use, we welcome and thank you for the opportunity to help you with your hospitality, healthcare, and textiles raw material supplies.
fabricContent: Experience the opulent allure of Farbrics, where lavish elegance intertwines with a blissful embrace. Immerse yourself in a realm of heavenly textures and exquisite comfort that transcends ordinary linens.

homeCarousel.heading: IMRAN GULF INDUSTRIES. F. CO
homeCarousel.desc: Experience the luxury of premium quality with IGI. The trusted source for hotels and home utility linen made with world class fabrics

homeCarousel.heading: 100% World Class Fabric
homeCarousel.desc: Experience the opulent allure of Farbrics, where lavish elegance intertwines with a blissful embrace.

homeCarousel.heading: Factory-Direct Source
homeCarousel.desc: Every order and customer request, large or small, is handled with timely offer and suggestion.

bed linen.title: IGI Linen
bed linen.description: Imran Gulf Industries is a well-known company that specializes in the creation of high-quality bed linen. We provide a comprehensive assortment of bed linen products, such as bedsheets, pillowcases, duvet covers, and more. We are  known for using premium materials and talented craftsmen to make its bed linen durable, comfortable, and aesthetically beautiful. Our designs cater to a wide range of tastes and preferences, making their goods suited for both residential and business contexts. IGI has a reputation for producing high-quality bed linen that combines elegance, functionality, and longevity.

flat bed sheet.title: Flat Bed Sheets
flat bed sheet.description: Our collection of Bed sheets are 5 star hotels approved, and have stood the test of stingent quality measures. Available in Percale and Satin fabrics, these come in various shades and design, and are suitable to adorn a variety of household tastes and decor.

fitted bed sheet.title: Fitted Bed Sheets
fitted bed sheet.description: A fitted bed sheet is a piece of material with elasticated corners designed to sit on top of the mattress and underneath you when you're in bed.

duvet.title: Duvets
duvet.description: A duvet is only good as it's filling. The 11G1' duvets come in a variety of sizes and are crafted from fillings made from natural fibers. The natural duvets have the benefits of being both durable and naturally breathable keeping you cozy. The synthetic fiber-filling duvets are designed to provide the feel and comfort of a natural down duvet. They combine soft textures and weightless warmth and are hypoallergenic.

duvet covers.title: Duvet Covers
duvet covers.description: Our collection of Duvet covers are 5 star hotels approved and have stood the test of stringent quality measures.

mattress protectors.title: Mattress Protectors
mattress protectors.description: A mattress protector is a piece of bedding that sits on top of a mattress. Preserve its QUALITY, Protect from STAIN, and Prolong its USE. • Fabric used is 100% Terry Cotton. • 100% Waterproof PU underlayer. • Extra wide 2'' Elastics on 4 corners for a firm grip. • Machine Washable and easy to maintain.

mattress encasement protectors.title: Mattress Encasement Protectors
mattress encasement protectors.description: A mattress protector is an item that encases totally over a mattress to protect it. • Fabric used is 100% Terry Cotton. • Bed bug-proof and waterproof fabric encase the entire mattress • Smooth hypoallergenic surface is quiet and will not change how a mattress feels. • 100% waterproof with watertight zipper and sealing bug flap.

bed runner.title: Bed Runner With Pillow
bed runner.description: Bed runner is a perfect and ideal bedroom bed decoration. It is comfortable, soft, durable and resistant to fading. Fine professional stitching and delicate edging make it more grading and durable.

bed skirt.title: Bed Skirt
bed skirt.description: A bed skirt is a piece of decorative fabric that is placed between the mattress and the box spring of a bed. Easy to fit and wrap-around style. The wrap-around bed skirt is three-sided skirt made for perfect finishing touch to your bed set.

pillow.title: Pillow
pillow.description: Our range of pillows is very feather soft, fluffy, and sweet dreams approved. Our expertise in the field ensures the 'IGI' pillows feature improved filling for maximum comfort, and peaceful sleeping hours. We also offer the convenience of a pillow menu, with a selection of pillows in varying sizes and designs to cater to the versatile needs of 5 star luxury hotels.

pillow cases.title: Pillow Cases
pillow cases.description: A pillow case is a removable cover for a pillow. It is washable and easily removable cloth over. Our company ensures a soft and luxurious feel.

pillow protectors.title: Pillow Protectors
pillow protectors.description: Available in Poly cotton Terry fabric Ultra-soft 100% waterproof PU coated Fabric. Easy to remove and wash. Zippered closure for extra safety and comfort. Treated against Dust mites and Microbial.

table cover.title: Table Cover
table cover.description: The opulent, beautiful design of the IGI 5-star hotel table cover improves the eating experience while also increasing the general ambience of expensive events and fine dining facilities. It is made from premium materials and has a smooth, polished appearance, making it a need for any dining occasion.

chair cover.title: Chair Cover
chair cover.description: The IGI 5 Star Premium Chair Cover is a fashionable, strong, and flexible addition for improving and safeguarding standard-sized chairs. It is a useful and fashionable option for both home and business usage thanks to its elegant five-star pattern, which also adds elegance. It is also simple to install and machine washable.

guest amenities.title: IGI Guest Amenities
guest amenities.description: In 5-star hotels, IGI guest facilities are famous for their high quality and opulent experience. These products, which have been made with the highest care and attention to detail, provide discriminating guests a relaxing and restorative experience. The assortment consists of high-quality shampoo, conditioner, body wash, lotion, and soap items. The sophisticated packaging lends an air of refinement and reflects the lavishness of the hotel. The distinctive scents of IGI create a rich sensory environment that pampers and re-energizes visitors.

bath towel.title: Bath Towel
bath towel.description: Enjoy maximum luxury with our premium bath towel, which is made of ultra -Soft, absorbent Cotton for a genuinely luxurious bathing experience.

hand towel.title: Hand Towel
hand towel.description: Indulge in luxury with our premium hand towel which is made of the finest long - staple cotton for unparalleled softness and absorbency, ensuring a pampering experience every time you reach for it.

face towel.title: Face Towel
face towel.description: The Premium face towel is made of the highest quality materials and is designed to deliver a Soothing and Caressing experience for your face.

bath mat.title: Bathroom Mat
bath mat.description: The star hotel bathroom mat is a plush, white, and opulent accessory that offers a Soft and Pleasant Stepping surface and adds a dash of class to the bathroom decor.

bathrobe.title: Bathrobe
bathrobe.description: Our luxury bathrobe offers unrivaled Comfort and elegance, enveloping you in a cloud-like embrace to transform your daily routine into a Spa-like vacation.

slippers.title: Slippers
slippers.description: These 5-star quality slippers are made of the finest materials and feature a plush, velvety exterior for a luxurious experience.

body lotion.title: Body Lotion
body lotion.description: Our 5-star body lotion offers a luxurious sensation, with a rich and velvety formula that deeply nourishes and hydrates skin, leaving it soft and supple.

shampoo.title: Shampoo
shampoo.description: Our 5-star quality shampoo offers ultimate luxury for your hair, with a blend of premium ingredients to cleanse, nourish, and revitalize. The rich lather leaves your hair soft, glossy, and fragrant.

soap.title: Soap
soap.description: Our five-star quality soap is crafted with premium ingredients to provide a luxurious bathing experience. Rich, creamy lather gently cleanses and nourishes skin, leaving it soft, supple, and scented.

shover gel.title: Shover Gel
shover gel.description: Our 5-star quality shower gel provides a luxurious experience with rich, velvety lather that gently cleanses and nourishes skin, leaving it soft, smooth and fragrant. Crafted with the finest ingredients and infused with exotic botanical extracts, it provides an opulent bathing ritual.

shover cap.title: Shover Cap
shover cap.description: Our 5-star quality shower cap is made of the finest materials, providing waterproof and durable protection for your hair. It has an elasticized band for a comfortable fit and an elegant aesthetic.

shaving kit.title: Shaving Kit
shaving kit.description: This 5-star kit includes a precision-engineered razor, a rich, high-performance shaving cream, and an irritation-free shave. It lathers into a velvety foam, nourishing and hydrating the skin, leaving it smooth and invigorated.

dental kit.title: Dental Kit
dental kit.description: Our deluxe 5-star dental kit provides the ultimate oral care experience with a high-quality toothbrush and premium toothpaste enriched with advanced whitening and cavity-fighting ingredients.

comb.title: Comb
comb.description: Our 5-star quality comb is a pinnacle of grooming perfection, made from the finest materials with precision-engineered teeth for luxuriously smooth and tangle-free grooming.

shoe shine.title: Shoe Shine
shoe shine.description: Our five-star quality shoe shine service restores the natural luster of your shoes using time-honored techniques and premium products. Each step is executed with unrivaled attention to detail, leaving your footwear with an unparalleled shine.

loofa.title: Loofa
loofa.description: Our 5-star quality loofa provides a gentle yet invigorating exfoliation, leaving skin velvety smooth and revitalized. It is made from premium, ultra-soft organic cotton and has long-lasting durability, making it the perfect companion for daily self-care.

sewing kit.title: Sewing Kit
sewing kit.description: This deluxe 5-star sewing kit includes premium needles and threads, making it a must-have for both beginners and experienced sewers. It is durable and stylish, providing a perfect blend of functionality and elegance.

homes.title: IGI Home
homes.description: IGI Home is known for its exceptional quality and luxurious feel, offering bed linens made from premium materials like high-thread-count cotton or silky-smooth sateen. These linens ensure durability, breathability, and a soft touch against the skin, while being carefully selected to withstand frequent washing. IGI Home offers a wide range of designs and patterns, catering to various tastes and preferences. The stitching and finishing of IGI Home are of the highest standard, ensuring long-lasting durability and preventing fraying or unraveling. The fitted sheets have deep pockets, providing a secure fit on mattresses of various thicknesses.

home comforter set.title: Home comforter set
home comforter set.description: Introducing our exquisite Luxury Comforter Set, the pinnacle of luxury and comfort, expertly manufactured in Saudi Arabia by IGI Linen Manufacturers. With its lavish comforter, velvety cushions, high-end pillowcases, and expertly tailored fitted bedsheets, this set redefines elegance. Enjoy the finest high-quality linens, designed to improve the atmosphere of both homes and hotels alike, to ensure a delightful night's sleep in a setting of timeless luxury. IGI Linen's classy range will elevate your way of life.

mattress protectors.title: Mattress Protectors
mattress protectors.description: A mattress protector is a piece of bedding that sits on top of a mattress. Preserve its QUALITY, Protect from STAIN, and Prolong its USE. • Fabric used is 100% Terry Cotton. • 100% Waterproof PU underlayer. • Extra wide 2'' Elastics on 4 corners for a firm grip. • Machine Washable and easy to maintain.

pillow.title: Pillow
pillow.description: Our range of pillows is very feather soft, fluffy, and sweet dreams approved. Our expertise in the field ensures the 'IGI' pillows feature improved filling for maximum comfort, and peaceful sleeping hours. We also offer the convenience of a pillow menu, with a selection of pillows in varying sizes and designs to cater to the versatile needs of 5 star luxury hotels.

pillow protectors.title: Pillow Protectors
pillow protectors.description: Available in Poly cotton Terry fabric Ultra-soft 100% waterproof PU coated Fabric. Easy to remove and wash. Zippered closure for extra safety and comfort. Treated against Dust mites and Microbial.

duvet covers.title: Duvet Covers
duvet covers.description: Our collection of Duvet covers are 5 star hotels approved and have stood the test of stringent quality measures.

fitted bed sheet.title: Fitted Bed Sheets
fitted bed sheet.description: A fitted bed sheet is a piece of material with elasticated corners designed to sit on top of the mattress and underneath you when you're in bed.

hotel supplies.title: IGI Hotel Supplies
hotel supplies.description: Imran Gulf Industries is a well-known company that specializes in the creation of high-quality bed linen. We provide a comprehensive assortment of bed linen products, such as bedsheets, pillowcases, duvet covers, and more. We are  known for using premium materials and talented craftsmen to make its bed linen durable, comfortable, and aesthetically beautiful. Our designs cater to a wide range of tastes and preferences, making their goods suited for both residential and business contexts. IGI has a reputation for producing high-quality bed linen that combines elegance, functionality, and longevity.

toilet paper tissue.title: Toilet Paper Tissue
toilet paper tissue.description: Our premium toilet paper is made from high-quality, responsibly-sourced materials, offering a plush, gentle touch and reliable durability. It provides the perfect combination of comfort and practicality for an exceptional bathroom indulgence.

hand paper tissue.title: Hand Paper Tissue
hand paper tissue.description: Our premium hand paper tissue ensures exceptional softness and strength. It provides a luxurious experience for all hand care needs, with superior absorbency and gentle touch.

face paper tissue.title: Face Paper Tissue
face paper tissue.description: Our premium face paper tissue is made with extra-thick, high-quality materials to pamper your skin while effectively absorbing moisture and oils. It is perfect for everyday use or special moments when only the best will do.

floor disinfectant.title: Floor Disinfectant
floor disinfectant.description: Our floor disinfectant is a powerful solution designed to effectively eliminate germs, bacteria, and viruses from floors. Its advanced formula provides long-lasting protection while leaving behind a clean and fresh scent, making it a safe and hygienic environment.

hand wash.title: Hand Wash
hand wash.description: Our high-quality hand wash combines a luxurious formula with nourishing ingredients to leave hands feeling clean, refreshed, and moisturized. It is infused with a delightful fragrance for a gentle yet effective cleansing experience.

hand sanitizer.title: Hand Sanitizer
hand sanitizer.description: Our hand sanitizer is a powerful and effective formula designed to kill germs and bacteria on contact. Its fast-drying, non-sticky formula leaves hands feeling clean, refreshed, and moisturized, while providing long-lasting protection against harmful pathogens. Perfect for on-the-go use.

washing detergent.title: Washing Detergent
washing detergent.description: Our high-quality washing detergent is formulated to tackle tough stains and deliver exceptional cleaning results. Its advanced formula ensures deep penetration into fabric fibers, removing dirt, grime, and odors while preserving vibrant colors and softness. Experience the ultimate cleanliness and freshness with our top-tier detergent.

iron box.title: Iron Box
iron box.description: The Iron Box is a durable, efficient ironing appliance with adjustable temperature settings for various fabrics. Its non-stick soleplate ensures smooth glide, reducing burn risks and ensuring safety and energy efficiency.

ironing table.title: Ironing Table
ironing table.description: The Ironing Table is a reliable, sturdy household item with adjustable height, heat-resistant iron rest, and a large surface. It's foldable, easy to store, and comes with a machine-washable cover.

fire extinguisher.title: Fire Extinguisher
fire extinguisher.description: A fire extinguisher is a crucial safety device for home and office use, addressing various fire types and ensuring easy use with clear instructions and safety pins.

news paper holder.title: News Paper Holder
news paper holder.description: With our 5-star hotel-inspired newspaper holder, you can elevate your home decor. This sleek and beautiful holder blends functionality and aesthetics with excellent attention to detail. Its strong structure and refined design make it the ideal addition for organizing your newspapers and adding a touch of luxury to any area.

podium.title: Podium
podium.description: Our premium podium embodies beauty and sophistication, and is designed to capture and command attention. It emanates a sleek and polished design, having been meticulously created with high-quality materials and attention to detail. This podium elevates any event or presentation with its solid structure and stylish design, providing a lasting sense of elegance and professionalism.

multi purpose cleaning cart.title: Multi Purpose Cleaning Cart
multi purpose cleaning cart.description: Our premium multipurpose cleaning cart is a versatile and effective solution for all of your cleaning needs. It has plenty of storage space, adjustable shelves, and built-in holders for various cleaning equipment. Its durable build and easy agility make it an indispensable tool for professional cleaners, allowing for easy mobility and efficient cleaning in any situation.

two tub cleaning cart.title: Two Tub Cleaning Cart
two tub cleaning cart.description: The premium two tub cleaner cart is designed for maximum efficiency and convenience, featuring a sturdy structure and ergonomic design to transport and organize cleaning goods while tackling many tasks at once.

single tub cleaning cart.title: Single Tub Cleaning Cart
single tub cleaning cart.description: The premium single tub cleaner cart is designed to simplify and elevate cleaning routines with its sturdy construction and smooth maneuverability. It provides ample storage space and durable wheels for easy mobility, making it ideal for commercial or residential use.

shoe polishing machine.title: Shoe Polishing Machine
shoe polishing machine.description: The premium shoe polishing machine is designed for convenience and efficiency, restoring the shine and luster of shoes with its powerful motor and high-quality brushes. It brings a professional touch to footwear maintenance in the comfort of your home.

food cart.title: Food Cart
food cart.description: The premium food cart with wheels is a mobile culinary masterpiece designed for convenience and style. It features ample storage space, a sleek countertop, and sturdy wheels for easy mobility.

blue laundry trolley 1 basket.title: Blue Laundry Trolley 1 Basket
blue laundry trolley 1 basket.description: The premium Blue laundry trolley is designed to streamline laundry routines with its spacious basket and durable construction, making it an ideal addition to any home or commercial setting.

hair dryer.title: Hair Dryer
hair dryer.description: This premium hair dryer features advanced ionic technology, multiple heat and speed settings, and a lightweight yet powerful motor for professional-looking results in the comfort of your own home.

kettle+tray+2 cups.title: Kettle + Tray + 2 Cups
kettle+tray+2 cups.description: The premium set features a sleek kettle, elegant tray, and two exquisite cups. The kettle is made of high-quality stainless steel and boils water with precision, while the matching tray adds a touch of sophistication. The cups complement the set perfectly.

weight scale.title: Weight Scale
weight scale.description: Modern scale with a sleek look and accurate functionality, the premium weight scale is state-of-the-art. It is made of durable materials, has a tempered glass platform, and is fitted with cutting-edge sensor technology for accurate readings over a wide weight range.

first aid box.title: First Aid Box
first aid box.description: The premium first aid box is designed to provide comprehensive emergency care. It features compartments and dividers to store essential medical supplies, making it the perfect companion for any home, office, or travel.

suggestion box.title: Suggestion Box
suggestion box.description: Our premium suggestion box offers a professional and secure solution for collecting valuable input from employees, customers, or visitors. Its intuitive design and convenient features ensure a seamless experience.

laundry bag.title: Laundry Bag
laundry bag.description: The 5-star quality laundry bag is crafted with durable fabrics and reinforced stitching for long-lasting performance. Its spacious interior and compartments offer ample storage for all laundry needs, while its sleek and sophisticated exterior adds a touch of luxury.

luggage rack.title: Luggage Rack
luggage rack.description: The 5-star hotel's luggage rack is composed of sturdy stainless steel and has a modern design with a polished finish. It offers a practical and fashionable way to store clothing and luggage, and because of its solid design and ability to carry large suitcases, it is dependable for both visitors and hotel personnel.

men's clothing hanger with lock.title: Men's Clothing Hanger With Lock
men's clothing hanger with lock.description: The ultimate 5-star quality men's hanger with a built-in lock mechanism ensures your valuable garments stay securely in place, preventing accidental slips or falls.

womens clothing hanger with lock.title: Womens Clothing Hanger With Lock
womens clothing hanger with lock.description: This 5-star quality women's hanger with a secure lock feature combines durability and elegance, ensuring your garments are protected with style.

automatic room freshener.title: Automatic Room Freshener
automatic room freshener.description: Our 5-star quality automatic room freshener offers a symphony of exquisite fragrances to transform any space into a haven of tranquility, with state-of-the-art sensor technology.

bathroom accessory set and bathroom mirr.title: Bathroom Accessory Set And Bathroom Mirror
bathroom accessory set and bathroom mirr.description: This hotel bathroom accessory set includes a robe hook, toothbrush tumbler, soap stand, bathroom mirror, and towel bar. The robe hook offers a chic and convenient place to hang a robe, while the toothbrush tumbler offers a fashionable storage solution. The soap stand keeps soap close at hand, while the bathroom mirror provides elegance and functionality. The towel bar completes the set, making it a luxurious haven.
bathroom accessory set and bathroom mirr.link: /hotel supplies/bathroom accessory set and bathroom mirror

stand for billboards.title: Stand For Billboards
stand for billboards.description: Our billboards boast 5-star quality, with vibrant colors, crystal-clear resolution, and meticulous attention to detail, making them an unrivaled promotional platform that leaves a lasting impression.

dustbin with tray.title: Dustbin With Tray
dustbin with tray.description: Our premium quality dustbin with tray combines functionality and elegance in a single package, boasting a spacious interior with an easy-to-clean removable tray. It is the epitome of sophistication, providing a seamless blend of practicality and style.

two layer dustbin.title: Two Layer Dustbin
two layer dustbin.description: The premium two-layer dustbin is crafted with precision and features a sleek stainless steel exterior, inner compartment, and odor-sealing lid for a five-star experience in waste management.

side opening dustbin.title: Side Opening Dustbin
side opening dustbin.description: High quality side-opening dustbin combines style and functionality, making it an essential accessory for maintaining cleanliness and organization.

steel pedal dustbin.title: Steel Pedal Dustbin
steel pedal dustbin.description: The hotel-style steel pedal dustbins are available in a range of sizes to meet a variety of applications. They are built of strong steel and have a pedal mechanism for easy and clean operation. They are great for maintaining cleanliness and refinement in any premium hotel setting.

dustbin steel.title: Dustbin Steel
dustbin steel.description: The hotel-style steel dustbins are available in a variety of brilliant colors to lend beauty and sophistication to any area.

barrier column and barrier rope.title: Barrier Column And Barrier Rope
barrier column and barrier rope.description: The 5-star hotel barrier column and rope are sophisticated crowd control elements designed to preserve order and give a sense of exclusivity. The barrier column is composed of high-quality materials, and the rope is made of soft velvet or strong braided rope. They work together to create a physical and visual barrier that adds refinement to the hotel's entrances, event spaces, and VIP zones.

chain lock.title: Chain Lock
chain lock.description: A 5-star hotel door chain lock adds an extra degree of security by preventing the door from fully opening and allowing illegal access.

hotel safe locker.title: Hotel Safe Locker
hotel safe locker.description: The 5-star hotel safe locker is a secure storage facility meant to safeguard the expensive goods of visitors. It is built of strong materials and has an electrical locking mechanism. It provides quick access via a personalized PIN code or key card system, and additional capabilities like fingerprint recognition or remote monitoring may be included in some models.

telephone.title: Telephone
telephone.description: The 5-star hotel telephone is a cutting-edge communication equipment that is both luxurious and convenient. It has a sleek and modern design, an easy-to-use UI, and high-quality audio for crystal-clear conversations.

prayer mat.title: Prayer Mat
prayer mat.description: The 5-star hotel prayer mat is a luxury, painstakingly created mat designed to meet the needs of guests. It has a smooth and velvety feel, elegant designs, and is small and light, making it easy to transport and store.

qibla direction sign.title: Qibla Direction Sign
qibla direction sign.description: A 5-star hotel's exquisite display, the Qibla direction sign, features an arrow and legible Arabic and English text that has been finely etched. It is lit by gentle ambient lighting and acts as a pointer for visitors to find the direction of prayer.

holy quran.title: Holy Quran
holy quran.description: Our Holy Qur'an is a high-end masterpiece that includes the whole text of the holy book and has beautiful calligraphy and elaborate decorations. The passages are clearly understood thanks to the accurate translation and insightful commentary, and the book's sturdy binding and opulent finish attest to its high caliber and veneration.

leather tissue box.title: Leather Tissue Box
leather tissue box.description: The 5-star quality leather tissue box is the epitome of luxury and sophistication. It features a durable and soft leather exterior, and is available in a range of colors to complement interior styles. Its compact design and discreet opening allow for easy tissue retrieval, making it a stylish and functional accessory.

mattresses.title: IGI Mattress
mattresses.description: Imran Gulf Industries is a prominent maker of quality mattresses with years of expertise and a dedication to perfection. Our expert artisans and engineers precisely create each mattress, employing cutting-edge technology and the best materials available. Our mattresses are associated with luxury, giving an opulent sleeping experience that rejuvenates both body and mind. We are devoted to sustainability and use eco-friendly measures throughout our production process. Our experienced and pleasant staff is always ready to assist you in locating the appropriate mattress, and we stand behind the quality of our mattresses with extensive guarantees. Choose Imran Gulf Industries and you can be confident that you are investing in a superb sleep solution that will reinvent your nights and invigorate your days.
